And because a sequence is also of positions of its individuals, there is the partial order relation on U. Firstly, this paper combines these two relations and puts forward the necessary condition that indicates the difference of the RS discriminant indices between sequence sorted correctly and another sorted wrongly. From the viewpoint of a vital and intelligent system, this paper designed a monitoring system of dam safety, which was composed of integration control, comprehensive inference engine, project database, model base, graphics base, and input/output modules. Metadata base based on OODM was used to implement the integration of homogeneous or nonhomogeneous databases storing dam safety data from different information sources.
